ngiemboon: Yěsô gíŋ ńgɔɔn mbwó megàŋakwò pé ngie: «Tà ntʉ́m gẅí gíŋ ḿvɛ. Pi záb ntʉ́m gẅí na Ssé, ńgíŋ ńzáb ntʉ́m gẅí na mèŋ.
en: “Don’t let your heart be troubled.    Believe   # 14:1 Or You believe in God;   # 14:1 Ac 16:34; 27:25; Rm 4:3,17,24; Gl 3:6; Ti 3:8; Jms 2:23; 1Jn 5:10 believe also in me.

ngiemboon: Mejʉʼʉ leneŋé, ée ndá Tá wɔ̀ɔn tà ńgyɔ́ɔn. N ge gʉa cwoŋte jʉʼʉ gí. É laa péʼe é té wó wɔ́, mbà mèŋ te shwóŋo gẅí ngie mèŋ n ge gʉa cwoŋte jʉʼʉ gí wɔ́.
en: In my Father’s house are many rooms. If it were not so, would I have told you that I am going    to prepare a place for you?

ngiemboon: N dɔɔn ńgÿo ńgʉa tà cwoŋte jʉʼʉ gí, mbà n ge piŋ nzèm éfaʼa gẅí, pege gʉa. À cʉa púʼu, ajʉʼ gie n gee lé wó, pi gíŋ ńgwɔ́ gí wó.
en: If I go away and prepare a place for you, I will come again    and take you to myself, so that where I am you may be also.   # 14:3 Jn 12:26

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na jʉʼ gie n gee né wó, mbà pi ne ńzsé mánzsè.»
en: You know the way to where I am going.”   ,# 14:4 Jn 7:28; 8:14; 16:5; 1Jn 2:11

ngiemboon: Tomásè gɔɔn né yé ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, peg te ne ńzsé jʉʼ gie ɔ̀ gee né wó wɔ́. Peg ge gǎa tá zsé mánzsè?»
en: “Lord,” Thomas   said, “we don’t know where you’re going. How can we know the way? ”

ngiemboon: Yěsô tsɔ́ʼɔ mbwó yé ngie: «Mèŋ, n gee mánzsè, mèŋ n gee nò nénʉ́, mèŋ n gee legwɔ́ wó. À lɔɔn ngwɔ́ nyìŋ le gʉa mvfò Tá wɔ̀ɔn, té cʉa pɔ́ na mèŋ wɔ́.
en: Jesus told him, “I am    the way,   # 14:6 Heb 10:20 the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

ngiemboon: Pi gwɔ́ péʼe ńzsé wɔ́ɔn, mbà pi zsé Tá wɔ̀ɔn yé. N kě ńgɔɔn páʼɔɔn, pi gwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼɔɔn ńne ńzsé yé. Mbà pi gyǎ yé.»
en: If you know me, you will also know    my Father.   # 14:7 Mt 11:27; 1Jn 2:23 From now on you do know him   # 14:7 Jn 17:3; 1Jn 4:8 and have seen him.”

ngiemboon: Filib júʼ, ńgɔɔn né Yěsô ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, nyɛɛ wég Tá gù ŋwɛ́, à kuʼ púʼu.»
en: “Lord,” said Philip,   “show us the Father, and that’s enough for us.”

ngiemboon: Yěsô gɔɔn né yé ngie: «Filib, pege neŋé nzẅìŋ wɔɔn, ɔ̀ nyě pɔ́ te zsě wɔ́ɔn la? Nyìŋ gẅie à gyǎ wɔ́ɔn la, à gyǎ Tá wɔ̀ɔn. Ɔ̀ gǎa ńgɔɔn ngie: “Nyɛɛ wég Tá gù ŋwɛ́?”
en: Jesus said to him, “Have I been among you all this time and you do not know me, Philip? The one who has seen me has seen the Father.    How can you say, ‘Show us the Father’?

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ te ne ńzẅíŋe ngie n gee né Tá wɔ̀ɔn, peg yé pú ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tàʼa mmó wɔ́ ka? Anò gie mèŋ shwóŋo gẅí, á téen fóo mbwó mèŋ wɔ́. Tá wɔ̀ɔn gẅie aa né mèŋ zɔ lɔgɔ wɔ́ɔn, éfaʼa mefàʼ mé.
en: Don’t you believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me?    The words I speak to you I do not speak on my own.   # 14:10 Jn 5:30 The Father who lives in me does his works.   # 14:10 Jn 5:36; 6:28; Heb 3:9; Rv 15:3

ngiemboon: N dɔɔn shwóŋo gẅí ngie n gee né Tá wɔ̀ɔn, peg yé pú ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tàʼa mmó, pi zẅíŋ ngie áa púʼu. Éfó ńgwɔ́ gie pi te zẅíŋe nò gie n gɔɔn wɔ́, pi fó ńdíe pɔ́ mefàʼ mie pi gyǎ mèŋ faʼ, ńzẅíŋ.
en: Believe me that I am in the Father and the Father is in me. Otherwise, believe    because of the works themselves.   # 14:11 Jn 10:38

ngiemboon: Tà mèŋ shwóŋo gẅí, kwàʼ nénʉ́, nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzáb ntʉ́m na mèŋ, mbà à ge faʼ yé mefàʼ mie mèŋ ne faʼa, tà mé fáŋ ńtɔ́g mɔ́ɔn mbɔɔ tɔ̌g, á nue mèŋ n gee né lejʉ́ŋ Tá.
en: “Truly I tell you, the one who believes in me    will also do the works that I do. And he will do even greater works than these,   # 14:12 Jn 5:20 because I am going to the Father.   # 14:12 Jn 7:33; 13:1,3; 16:5,10,17,28; 17:11,13; 20:17

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńgÿo ńdɔg lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn ńdúɔ kɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, mbà n ge gÿo. Á cʉa púʼu, mèŋ múɔ n daʼte legúʼ Tá wɔ̀ɔn.
en: Whatever you ask in my name, I will do it so that the Father may be glorified    in the Son.   # 14:13 Jn 5:19

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńdɔg lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn ńdúɔ mmó mbwó mèŋ, mbà n ge gÿo yɛ̌ mmó.
en: If you ask me    anything in my name,   # 14:14 Jn 10:25 I will do it.   # 14:14 Other mss omit all of v. 14,# 14:14 Jn 11:22; 15:7,16; 16:23–24

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńkwoŋo wɔ́ɔn, mbà pi ge gÿo kúʼte membʉ̌ mɔ́ɔn.
en: “If you love me, you will keep    my commands.   # 14:15 1Jn 5:3

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n deen ńké sẅíŋte Tá wɔ̀ɔn, à náa wetsɔ̌ ntàgnzèm né pi, á gẅie pi lâ pɔ̌ zɔ ge cʉ́ʼʉ gwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm.
en: And I will ask the Father, and he will give you another Counselor   ,# 14:16 Lk 24:49; Jn 14:26; 15:26; 16:7; 1Jn 2:1; Ac 2:33 to be with you forever.

ngiemboon: Antàgnzèm ŋwɛ́, à gwɔ́ pɔ́ Zẅìge Ssé, à laʼte nò nénʉ́. Epʉ̀a njÿó té kuʼu lékúe Zẅìge ŋwɛ́ wɔ́, mélàʼmie pɔ́ té ne ńgyá mefàʼ mé wɔ́, ḿbiŋ ńké te ne ńzsé yé wɔ́. Táʼ, pi ne ńzsé yé, mélàʼmie aa lejʉ́ŋ pi, ḿbiŋ ńgwɔ́ na pi.
en: He is the Spirit    of truth.   # 14:17 Ps 119:142; 2Th 2:10; 1Jn 4:6 The world is unable to receive him because it doesn’t see him or know him. But you do know him, because he remains with you and will be   # 14:17 Other mss read and is in you.   # 14:17 1Jn 4:4

ngiemboon: N těen ńge nyé gẅí pi gwɔ́ púɔ métsé wɔ́. N ne ńtóo né lejʉ́ŋ pi.
en: “I will not leave you as orphans; I am coming to you.

ngiemboon: Á cʉ́ʼ pɔ́ méjʉʼ, epʉ̀a njÿó le gíŋ ńgyá wɔ́ɔn mɔ́, táʼ, ńgʉa na pi, mbà pi ne ńgyá wɔ́ɔn gyǎ, mélàʼmie n gwɔ̌ pɔ́ ntʉ̀ntʉ̀. Pi gÿo ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ gí ntʉ̀ntʉ̀.
en: In a little while the world will no longer see me,    but you will see me.   # 14:19 Jn 16:16 Because I live, you will live   # 14:19 Php 1:21 too.

ngiemboon: Á ge gÿo gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, pi zsé ngie peg Tá wɔ̀ɔn pǔ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tàʼa mmó, é gíŋ zsé ngie pi ee né mèŋ, n gwɔ́ ntʉ́m pi.
en: On that day you will know that I am in my Father,    you are in me, and I am in you.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkúʼte membʉ̌ mɔ́ɔn, ńne ńgiŋe mǒ, mbà ngàŋ aa nyìŋ gẅie à ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́ɔn. Tá wɔ̀ɔn ge kwoŋo nyìŋ gẅie à kwoŋo wɔ́ɔn, mbɔɔ mèŋ yɔ́ɔn n gíŋ ńkwoŋo wɛ̌ nyìŋ, ńgÿo à zsé wɔ́ɔn.»
en: The one who has my commands and keeps them is the one who loves me.    And the one who loves me will be loved by my Father.   # 14:21 Dt 7:12–13; Jn 16:27 I also will love him and will reveal myself to him.”

ngiemboon: Jẅíndà, mé ké těen ńgɔɔn Isekalyɔd wɔ́, á gɔɔn né Yěsô ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á ge gwɔ́ lêkɔ́ tá ɔ̀ gÿo peg ndàʼ zɔ gyá gú, epʉ̀a metsèm le gyá gú wɔ́ wɔ́ɔ?»
en: Judas   (not Iscariot) said to him, “Lord, how is it you’re going to reveal yourself to us and not to the world? ”  # 14:22 Ac 10:40–41

ngiemboon: Yěsô tsɔ́ʼɔ mbwó yé ngie: «Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwoŋo wɔ́ɔn, mbà à ge kúʼte shwóŋè yɔ́ɔn. Tá wɔ̀ɔn piŋ ńkwoŋo yé, peg Tá wɔ̀ɔn tó ńtsɛ́ɛ yé, ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńnéŋe pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m yé.
en: Jesus answered, “If anyone loves me, he will keep my word. My Father will love him, and we will come to him and make our home with him.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn te wɔ́ɔn kwoŋ, mbà à te kúʼte shwóŋè yɔ́ɔn mɔ́. Ashwóŋè ŋwɛ́ zɔɔn těen fóo pɔ́ mbwó mèŋ wɔ́. Á fóo pɔ́ mbwó Tá wɔ̀ɔn gẅie à ka túmo wɔ́ɔn.
en: The one who doesn’t love me will not keep my words. The word that you hear is not mine but is from the Father who sent me.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ shwóŋo gẅí mɔɔn menò á fʉ̀ʼ gie pege nyě ńgwɔ́ lɔɔn.
en: “I have spoken these things to you while I remain with you.

ngiemboon: Pi ge cʉ́ʼ nzèm, Tá wɔ̀ɔn lɔg lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn, ńtúmo Ntàgnzèm gẅí, à gwɔ́ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a. À tó ńzíʼi gẅí shúm ntsèm, ńgÿo pi kímte kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie n dǎ shwóŋo gẅí.
en: But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit,    whom the Father will send   # 14:26 Lk 24:49; Jn 14:16; 15:26; 16:7; Ac 2:33 in my name, will teach you all things   # 14:26 Jn 16:13; 1Co 2:10; 1Jn 2:27 and remind you of everything I have told you.   # 14:26 Jn 2:22; 2Pt 1:21

ngiemboon: Tà pi cʉ́ʼ nzèm, entʉ́m gẅí gíŋ ḿvɛ, tà pi cÿɔʼ. N ge néŋ mbʉ́lè tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅí, e gwɔ́ mbʉ́lè gie e fóo na mèŋ, e te gie mé faʼa tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó wɔ́.
en: “Peace I leave with you. My peace I give to you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Don’t let your heart be troubled or fearful.

ngiemboon: Pi jǔʼ páʼ n gɔ̌ɔn ngie: “N ge gʉa tá gíŋ piŋ nzèm, é gyá gẅí.” Pi kaa péʼe ńne ńkwoŋo wɔ́ɔn, mbà pi kág kǎg páʼ n gee né lejʉ́ŋ Tá, á nue Tá à fǎŋ ńcʉa wɔ́ɔn.
en: You have heard me tell you, ‘I am going away    and I am coming to you.’ If you loved me, you would rejoice that I am going to the Father,   # 14:28 Jn 16:10 because the Father is greater than I.   # 14:28 Jn 10:29; 1Jn 3:20; 4:4

ngiemboon: N tʉ́ njÿó éshwóŋo gẅí mɔɔn menò fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, tá e gÿo ńtó, légwɔ́ gie é lɔɔn ńtó, pi záb ntʉ́m na mèŋ.
en: I have told you now before it happens    so that when it does happen you may believe.

ngiemboon: Tà fó fʉ̀ʼɔɔn pege te gíŋe ńgee shwóŋe wɔ́. Á nue fùɔ gẅie à sáʼa yɔɔn njÿó ne ńtóo. À te gẅiin shÿó légÿo mmó na mèŋ wɔ́.
en: I will not talk with you much longer, because the ruler of the world    is coming. He has no power over me.   # 14:30 Lit He has nothing in me,# 14:30 Lk 4:6

ngiemboon: Táʼ, mé zẅǐŋ ngie à tó púʼu, epʉ̀a mesoŋ tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó leen ńké ńzsé ngie mèŋ kwoŋo Tá wɔ̀ɔn, ḿbiŋ ńne ńgÿo pɔ́ mmó gie à tsẅǐ ngie n gÿo. Pi lu ssé pege fó jʉʼɔɔn ńgʉa.»
en: On the contrary, so that the world may know that I love the Father, I do as the Father commanded me.
